description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective communication on child rights issues with stakeholders., which contributes to Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Sri Lanka Country Programme is effectively and efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective communication on child rights issues with stakeholders.

description.narrative: UNICEF delivered targeted and mass COVID-19 communications to educate mass audiences and key at-risk groups on prevention, caregiving, stigma and the safe resumption of a ‘new normal', in close collaboration with the Government and partners. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:25/08/2020
